content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Good afternoon, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. Based on your needs, I would like to propose a rental price of €700 per month. This price takes into consideration the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in the area. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Hello Nesibe Trabelsi, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I appreciate your interest in the property. I understand that you are a student and want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. I have taken this into consideration and would like to propose a rental price of €650 per month. This price is based on the market rate for similar apartments in the area and the cost of maintaining the property. I hope this price is within your budget.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Thank you for considering my proposal. While €650 per month is certainly an attractive price, I would like to offer you a price of €700 per month. This price is based on the current market rates for similar apartments in the area and the cost of maintaining the property. I understand that you are a student, but I hope you will find this price affordable and reasonable. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Hello Nesibe Trabelsi, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are a student and want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. I would like to propose a rental price of €720 per month. This price takes into consideration the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in the area. I hope this price is within your budget. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
